description:
The Nightmare, you love or you hate her. She is here for one reason and one reason only. To win, to win hard, and to fuck hard. Ok that’s like 3 reasons or something, but the fact is Syd will destroy you if you are not ready.
The Scorpion is a hellcat feisty, nasty girl that grew up with brothers. She is street tough and takes shit from no one. That’s how it is in the real world. This is not the real world and no matter how mean you might act, this is the US and street tough girls tend to get fucked like loser sluts on the mat.
BTW, Syd broke the US scoring record for one match.
title: The Nightmare (4-0)
